verses.verse: <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, to my <S%H8451>law<s%>: <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. Maschil: or, A Psalm for Asaph to give instruction
I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in a <S%H4912>parable<s%>: I will <S%H5042>utter<s%> dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>:
Which we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H3045>known<s%>, and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> us.

We will not <S%H3582>hide<s%> them from their <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H5608>shewing<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and his <S%H5807>strength<s%>, and his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>.

For he <S%H6965>established<s%> a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H8451>law<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, that they should make them <S%H3045>known<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%>:

That the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%> them, even the <S%H1121>children<s%> which should be <S%H3205>born<s%>; who should <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> them to their <S%H1121>children<s%>:

That they might <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H3689>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>, and not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, but <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>:

And might not be as their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%>; a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H3559>set<s%> not their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3559>aright<s%>, and whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was not <S%H539>stedfast<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>. that: Heb. that prepared not their heart

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, being <S%H5401>armed<s%>, and <S%H7411>carrying<s%> <S%H7198>bows<s%>, turned <S%H2015>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%>. carrying: Heb. throwing forth
They <S%H8104>kept<s%> not the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>law<s%>;
And <S%H7911>forgat<s%> his <S%H5949>works<s%>, and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> that he had <S%H7200>shewed<s%> them.
Marvellous <S%H6382>things<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he in the <S%H5048>sight<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>.
He <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and caused them to pass <S%H5674>through<s%>; and he made the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5324>stand<s%> as an <S%H5067>heap<s%>.
In the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> also he <S%H5148>led<s%> them with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and all the <S%H3915>night<s%> with a <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
He <S%H1234>clave<s%> the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and gave them <S%H8248>drink<s%> as out of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>depths<s%>.
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H5140>streams<s%> also out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and caused <S%H4325>waters<s%> to run <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H5104>rivers<s%>.
And they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> against him by <S%H4784>provoking<s%> the most <S%H5945>High<s%> in the <S%H6723>wilderness<s%>.
And they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> by <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> for their <S%H5315>lust<s%>.

Yea, they <S%H1696>spake<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>; they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3201>Can<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6186>furnish<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? furnish: Heb. order

Behold, he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>, and the <S%H5158>streams<s%> <S%H7857>overflowed<s%>; <S%H3201>can<s%> he <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> also? <S%H3201>can<s%> he <S%H3559>provide<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%>?

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this, and was <S%H5674>wroth<s%>: so a <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5400>kindled<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H639>anger<s%> also came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;
Because they <S%H539>believed<s%> not in <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H982>trusted<s%> not in his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>:
Though he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%>, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,
And had rained <S%H4305>down<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> upon them to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and had <S%H5414>given<s%> them of the <S%H1715>corn<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
<S%H376>Man<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H47>angels'<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%>: he <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H6720>meat<s%> to the <S%H7648>full<s%>. Man: or, Every one did eat the bread of the mighty
He caused an east <S%H6921>wind<s%> to <S%H5265>blow<s%> in the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and by his <S%H5797>power<s%> he brought <S%H5090>in<s%> the south <S%H8486>wind<s%>. to blow: Heb. to go

He <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> also upon them as <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and <S%H3671>feathered<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> like as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: feathered: Heb. fowl of wing
And he let it <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of their <S%H4264>camp<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> their <S%H4908>habitations<s%>.
So they did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and were <S%H3966>well<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%>: for he <S%H935>gave<s%> them their own <S%H8378>desire<s%>;
They were not <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from their <S%H8378>lust<s%>. But while their <S%H400>meat<s%> was yet in their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>,

The <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> upon them, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H4924>fattest<s%> of them, and smote <S%H3766>down<s%> the <S%H970>chosen<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. smote: Heb. made to bow Chosen: or, young men
For all this they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> still, and <S%H539>believed<s%> not for his wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
Therefore their <S%H3117>days<s%> did he <S%H3615>consume<s%> in <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H928>trouble<s%>.
When he <S%H2026>slew<s%> them, then they <S%H1875>sought<s%> him: and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> and enquired <S%H7836>early<s%> after <S%H410>God<s%>.
And they <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was their <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and the <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> their <S%H1350>redeemer<s%>.
Nevertheless they did <S%H6601>flatter<s%> him with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and they <S%H3576>lied<s%> unto him with their <S%H3956>tongues<s%>.
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was not <S%H3559>right<s%> with him, neither were they <S%H539>stedfast<s%> in his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

But he, being full of <S%H7349>compassion<s%>, <S%H3722>forgave<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them not: yea, many a <S%H7235>time<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> he his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%>, and did not stir <S%H5782>up<s%> all his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>.
For he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that they were but <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; a <S%H7307>wind<s%> that passeth <S%H1980>away<s%>, and cometh not <S%H7725>again<s%>.
<S%H4100>How<s%> oft did they <S%H4784>provoke<s%> him in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H6087>grieve<s%> him in the <S%H3452>desert<s%>! provoke: or, rebel against
Yea, they turned <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, and <S%H8428>limited<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
They <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, nor the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H6299>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H6862>enemy<s%>. from: or, from affliction
How he had <S%H7760>wrought<s%> his <S%H226>signs<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and his <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>: wrought: Heb. set
And had <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers<s%> into <S%H1818>blood<s%>; and their <S%H5140>floods<s%>, that they could not <S%H8354>drink<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> divers sorts of <S%H6157>flies<s%> among them, which <S%H398>devoured<s%> them; and <S%H6854>frogs<s%>, which <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> them.
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> also their <S%H2981>increase<s%> unto the <S%H2625>caterpiller<s%>, and their <S%H3018>labour<s%> unto the <S%H697>locust<s%>.
He <S%H2026>destroyed<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> with <S%H1259>hail<s%>, and their sycomore <S%H8256>trees<s%> with <S%H2602>frost<s%>. destroyed: Heb. killed frost: or, great hailstones
He gave <S%H5462>up<s%> their <S%H1165>cattle<s%> also to the <S%H1259>hail<s%>, and their <S%H4735>flocks<s%> to hot <S%H7565>thunderbolts<s%>. gave: Heb. shut up hot: or, lightnings

He <S%H7971>cast<s%> upon them the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>, <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, and <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, and <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, by <S%H4917>sending<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4397>angels<s%> among them.

He <S%H6424>made<s%> a <S%H5410>way<s%> to his <S%H639>anger<s%>; he <S%H2820>spared<s%> not their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>, but <S%H5462>gave<s%> their <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>; He made: Heb. He weighed a path life: or, beasts to the murrain
And <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H202>strength<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>:
But made his own <S%H5971>people<s%> to go <S%H5265>forth<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H5090>guided<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like a <S%H5739>flock<s%>.
And he <S%H5148>led<s%> them on <S%H983>safely<s%>, so that they <S%H6342>feared<s%> not: but the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>. overwhelmed: Heb. covered
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, even to this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, which his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> had <S%H7069>purchased<s%>.

He cast <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> also <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H5307>divided<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H2256>line<s%>, and made the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
Yet they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> and <S%H4784>provoked<s%> the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H8104>kept<s%> not his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>:
But turned <S%H5472>back<s%>, and dealt <S%H898>unfaithfully<s%> like their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: they were turned <S%H2015>aside<s%> like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>.
For they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and moved him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their graven <S%H6456>images<s%>.
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> this, he was <S%H5674>wroth<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3988>abhorred<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
So that he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, the <S%H168>tent<s%> which he <S%H7931>placed<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>;
And <S%H5414>delivered<s%> his <S%H5797>strength<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, and his <S%H8597>glory<s%> into the <S%H6862>enemy's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
He <S%H5462>gave<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> also unto the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
The <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> their young <S%H970>men<s%>; and their <S%H1330>maidens<s%> were not given to <S%H1984>marriage<s%>. given: Heb. praised
Their <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and their <S%H490>widows<s%> made no <S%H1058>lamentation<s%>.
Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3364>awaked<s%> as one out of <S%H3463>sleep<s%>, and like a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> that <S%H7442>shouteth<s%> by reason of <S%H3196>wine<s%>.
And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> his <S%H6862>enemies<s%> in the hinder <S%H268>parts<s%>: he <S%H5414>put<s%> them to a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
Moreover he <S%H3988>refused<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H977>chose<s%> not the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>:
But <S%H977>chose<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> which he <S%H157>loved<s%>.
And he <S%H1129>built<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> like <S%H7311>high<s%> palaces, like the <S%H776>earth<s%> which he hath <S%H3245>established<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. established: Heb. founded
He <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> him from the <S%H4356>sheepfolds<s%> <S%H6629><s%>:

From <S%H310>following<s%> the ewes great with <S%H5763>young<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>. following: Heb. after
So he <S%H7462>fed<s%> them according to the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of his <S%H3824>heart<s%>; and <S%H5148>guided<s%> them by the <S%H8394>skilfulness<s%> of his <S%H3709>hands<s%>.
